page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: My house is a semi-detached in a quiet road. We have a small garden with flowers at the front and a larger garden at the back with a swing. We have two dogs, called Bonnie and Pye, a rabbit, and a guinea-pig called Squeak. Our kitchen has been extended to give us extra space like another lounge. We have a video-recorder and a car and I have a bicycle. My mum works in an office building and my dad is a prison officer. My sister works as a secretary. We have our own bedrooms - mine is the biggest but is always a mess. On Saturday my sister goes to watch Liverpool F.C. when they play at home. I go to guides on Fridays and to swimming on a Tuesday in Deyes High School.
